title: Teambuilder Icons - Any further info?

embed.description: Hey everyone, Way back when we launched Team Builder, we introduced six earnable, role-specific icons. Because Team Builder’s being taken down when new champ select goes live, those icons will hit the ice box while we find a new home for them. They’ll come back in an earnable form, we

body: So in the link I posted, we know that these icons are now trying to find a new home. I, for one, would love to snag these icons, but... have we heard anything of them since this post was created? I'd just like to know if anyone has anymore information on them, thanks.

replies.body: The info you have is the info that we have. There haven't been any updates regarding the Team Builder icons, especially when the icons will return and in what form. When there's an update to this, you'll definitely see an announcement on the frontpage. Until then, fingers crossed! Sorry I couldn't provide more information.
Don't be sorry. Any information is something! And thank you, I hope to see those Team Builder icons sooner or later. ^_^
